sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './HowItWorks.css'; import { useLanguage } from '../contexts/LanguageContext'; const HowItWorks: React.FC = () => { const { t } = useLanguage(); const steps = [ { number: 1, title: t.howItWorks.step1.title, description: t.howItWorks.step1.description, image: '/7N5A0530.JPG', icon: ( ), color: '#B24A3B' }, { number: 2, title: t.howItWorks.step2.title, description: t.howItWorks.step2.description, image: '/7N5A0773.jpg', icon: ( ), color: '#C85A4A' }, { number: 3, title: t.howItWorks.step3.title, description: t.howItWorks.step3.description, image: '/7N5A1361.jpg', icon: ( ), color: '#D66A58' }, { number: 4, title: t.howItWorks.step4.title, description: t.howItWorks.step4.description, image: '/7N5A2536.jpg', icon: ( ), color: '#A03D30' }, { number: 5, title: t.howItWorks.step5.title, description: t.howItWorks.step5.description, image: '/7N5A4158.jpg', icon: ( ), color: '#E47A66' }, { number: 6, title: t.howItWorks.step6.title, description: t.howItWorks.step6.description, image: '/7N5A6375.jpg', icon: ( ), color: '#8a3a2d' }, { number: 7, title: t.howItWorks.step7.title, description: t.howItWorks.step7.description, image: '/7N5A8618.jpg', icon: ( ), color: '#F28A74' }, ]; return (

{t.howItWorks.title}

{t.howItWorks.subtitle}

{/* Grupo 1: Pasos 1 y 2 */}
{steps[0].icon}
{steps[0].number}

{steps[0].title}

{steps[0].description}

{steps[1].icon}
{steps[1].number}

{steps[1].title}

{steps[1].description}

{/* Grupo 2: Pasos 3 y 4 */}
{steps[2].icon}
{steps[2].number}

{steps[2].title}

{steps[2].description}

{steps[3].icon}
{steps[3].number}

{steps[3].title}

{steps[3].description}

{/* Grupo 3: Pasos 5 y 6 */}
{steps[4].icon}
{steps[4].number}

{steps[4].title}

{steps[4].description}

{steps[5].icon}
{steps[5].number}

{steps[5].title}

{steps[5].description}

{/* Paso 7 - Centrado */}
{steps[6].icon}
{steps[6].number}

{steps[6].title}

{steps[6].description}

{/* Nota especial sobre reconocimiento facial */}

{t.howItWorks.smartSearch.title}

{t.howItWorks.smartSearch.description}

{/* CTA Button */}
{t.howItWorks.cta}
); }; export default HowItWorks;
